notAvailableText: Sorry, there are no available payment methods

deposit.title: Deposit
deposit.addressDescription: This is your personal address for deposits. Your funds will be available as soon as they pass through the necessary confirmations.

bonuses.title: Chose a bonus
bonuses.infoDescription: Once your deposit is credited, it will activate a selected bonus. If you have already made a deposit, please don't change the selected bonus until the deposit is credited to the game balance.

cash_agent.title: Tell the agent your details
cash_agent.description: Do not tell anyone except the agent your ID!

limit.title: You have reached your deposit limit
limit.description: You have setup your deposit limit:

tryAnotherRegion: There are no payment methods in the selected country. Please try another region
countryAutomatic: The country has been selected automatically. You can change the selection, but the list of payment providers and the fee amount may change. Make the best choice
